ProductInfo.Features:
4 CH H.264 compression triplex real time CIF/HD1/D1 picture resolution industrial DVR, with 2000GB hard drive
Support daylight saving time, PIP and EZOOM function, live video, parameter setting and copy playback video via network
Two USB interface, one for data backup, one for mouse operation
4 day night vision infrared color CCD security cameras 6.0mm lens 24 IR leds 420 TV Lines
Package included: digital video recorder, 2000GB hard drive, DVR remote control, DVR power supply, user manual and software CD, USB mouse, 4 pack 50 feet security camera extension wire, 4 CCD security cameras, 1 of 4 channel camera power supply
ProductInfo.Name: VideoSecu 4 Channel H.264 Real Time CCTV Security Camera Network DVR System with 4 CCD Home Security Cameras 420TVL 24 IR Leds for Night Vision, 4 of 50 Feet Video Extension Cables, 1 of 4 Channel Power Supply, 1of 2000GB Hard Drive WB4
